mapper.update: update company set companylocation=#{companylocation} where companyid=#{companyid} and companykind=2
mapper.delete: delete from dog dog where exists (select * from dogpics dp where dp.dogid=dog.dogid and dog.dogid=#{dogid})
mapper.update: update companypic set (comapnypic=#{param1}, companyid=#{param2}) where companyid=#{companyid}
update company set (comapnycard=#{param1}, companyid=#{param2}) where companyid=#{companyid}
